Skills.Name: Ethereal Dance
Skills.Description: Reduces DMG Received for all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 5s. Further raises ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 10s if Blue Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces DMG Received for all allies, raises ATK if Blue Elemental

Skills.Name: East Wind Dance
Skills.Description: Inflicts 3-hit DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> + <color=red>{4}%</color> + <color=red>{8}%</color>) on single enemy with highest ATK. Every hit further carries a 30% chance to inflict Dark (5s), Seal (5s) and Stun (3s) each.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts 3-hit DMG on single enemy. Every hit further carries a chance to inflict Dark, Seal and Stun

Skills.Name: Bell Chime Dance
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> DMG on single enemy. Further inflicts Seal for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription:
Inflicts DMG and Seal on single
enemy

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>75.00%-1500.00%</color> DMG according to Combo Bonus.

Skills.Name: Snow-White Spirit Fox
Skills.Description: Each time DMG is inflicted, shields DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of first ally in line for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is inflicted, shields DMG of first ally in line

Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is inflicted, shields DMG of first ally in line, raises DMG Inflicted if Blue Elemental

Skills.Name: Snow-White Spirit Fox: Yukime Only
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, raises DMG Inflicted for first ally in line by <color=red>{0}%</color> if Blue Elemental (Permanent). Further increases DMG Inflicted by <color=red>{1}%</color> if Tank. (Permanent)
